title: Calculation
text: Multiply the first equation by $$3$$, multiply the second equation by $$4$$, and add them together: $$3\left(3x-4z\right)+4\left(2y+3z\right)=3\left(-1\right)+4\times2$$

title: Calculation
text: Multiply the third equation by $$9$$ and subtract with $$2\left(9x+8y\right)=2\times5$$: $$9\left(2x+3y\right)-2\left(9x+8y\right)=9\times6-2\times5$$
